Offensive Guard.description: Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed guard.

Critical Boost.description: Increases the damage of critical hits.
levels: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 28%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 31%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 34%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 37%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 40%.

Critical Draw.description: Increases affinity when performing draw attacks. (Not effective while riding.)

Fire Attack.description: Increases fire element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Water Attack.description: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Ice Attack.description: Increases ice element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Thunder Attack.description: Increases thunder element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Dragon Attack.description: Increases dragon element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Poison Attack.description: Increases the rate of poison buildup. (Poison buildup has a maximum limit.)

Paralysis Attack.description: Increases the rate of paralysis buildup. (Paralysis buildup has a maximum limit.)

Sleep Attack.description: Increases the rate of sleep buildup. (Sleep buildup has a maximum limit.)

Blast Attack.description: Increases the rate of blast buildup. (Blast buildup has a maximum limit.)

Critical Element.description: Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.
levels: Slightly increases elemental damage while active.
Greatly increases elemental damage while active.

Critical Status.description: Increases abnormal status effects (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.
levels: Slightly increases abnormal status effects when landing critical hits.
Increases abnormal status effects when landing critical hits.
Greatly increases abnormal status effects when landing critical hits.

Charge Master.description: Increases element power and status buildup for charged attacks.
levels: Slightly increases elemental damage and status buildup for charged attacks.
Increases elemental damage and status buildup for charged attacks.
Greatly increases elemental damage and status buildup for charged attacks.

Handicraft.description: Extends the weapon sharpness gauge. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum.

Razor Sharp.description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness.
levels: Grants a 10% chance of no sharpness loss.
Grants a 25% chance of no sharpness loss.
Grants a 50% chance of no sharpness loss.

Protective Polish.description: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.
levels: Grants no sharpness loss for 30 seconds after activation.
Grants no sharpness loss for 60 seconds after activation.
Grants no sharpness loss for 90 seconds after activation.

Mind's Eye.description: Your attacks are deflected less and deal more damage to hard targets.
levels: 50% chance of your attacks not being deflected, +10% damage to hard targets.
100% chance of your attacks not being deflected, +15% damage to hard targets.
100% chance of your attacks not being deflected, +30% damage to hard targets.

Bludgeoner.description: Increases attack power when your weapon sharpness is low.
levels: +5% attack power when your sharpness gauge is yellow or lower.
+10% attack power when your sharpness gauge is yellow or lower.
+10% attack power when your sharpness gauge is green or lower.

Master's Touch.description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.
levels: Grants an 80% chance of no sharpness loss while active.

Normal Shots.description: Increases the power of the bowgun's special ammo, and the bow's Dragon Piercer, Thousand Dragons, and Tracer.
levels: Slightly increases the power of specified ammo and arrows.

Piercing Shots.description: Increases the attack of the bowgun's Pierce Ammo, and the bow's Dragon Piercer and Thousand Dragons.
levels: Slightly increases the power of specified ammo and arrows.

Spread/Power Shots.description: Increases the attack of the bowgun's Spread Ammo and the bow's Power Shots and Quick Shots.
levels: Slightly increases the power of specified ammo and arrows.

Ballistics.description: Extends the range in which ammo and arrows have maximum power.

Opening Shot.description: Increases the bowgun's reload speed and increases the power of bullets when fully loaded
levels: Moderately increases bowgun reload speed and attack power of ammo when certain conditions are met.
Increases bowgun reload speed and attack power of ammo when certain conditions are met.
Greatly increases bowgun reload speed and attack power of ammo when certain conditions are met.

Tetrad Shot.description: Increases the affinity of bowgun ammo/coatings from the fourth shot and attack of the fourth and sixth shots.
levels: Slightly increases the attack power and affinity of ammo after certain conditions are met.
Moderately increases the attack power and affinity of ammo after certain conditions are met.
Increases the attack power and affinity of ammo after certain conditions are met.

Special Ammo Boost.description: Increases the power of the bowgun's special ammo, and the bow's Dragon Piercer, Thousand Dragons, and Tracer
levels: Moderately increases the power of specified ammo and arrows.
Increases the power of specified ammo and arrows.

Poison Functionality.description: Allows you to apply poison coatings.

Para Functionality.description: Allows you to apply paralysis coatings.

Sleep Functionality.description: Allows you to apply sleep coatings.

Blast Functionality.description: Allows you to apply blast coatings.

Exhaust Functionality.description: Allows you to apply exhaust coatings.

Focus.description: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.
levels: Slightly increases gauge fill rate and reduces charge times by 5%.
Moderately increases gauge fill rate and reduces charge times by 10%.
Increases gauge fill rate and reduces charge times by 15%.

Power Prolonger.description: Allows long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes, and charge blades stay powered up longer.
levels: Moderately boosts the duration weapons are powered up.
Boosts the duration weapons are powered up.
Greatly boosts the duration weapons are powered up.

Punishing Draw.description: Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power. (Not effective while riding.)
levels: Draw attacks deal a small amount of stun damage and gain attack +3.
Draw attacks deal a medium amount of stun damage and gain attack +5.
Draw attacks deal a large amount of stun damage and gain attack +7.

Slugger.description: Makes it easier to stun monsters.

Stamina Thief.description: Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.

Artillery.description: Strengthens explosive attacks like shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and Sticky Ammo.
levels: Moderately increases each attack and Wyvern's Fire firing speed. Shelling fire attack +30.
Increases each attack and Wyvern's Fire firing speed. Shelling fire attack +60.
Greatly increases each attack and Wyvern's Fire firing speed. Shelling fire attack +90.

Rapid Morph.description: Increases switch speed and power for switch axes and charge blades.

Horn Maestro.description: Increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies. (Effect lost when you change weapons)
levels: Extends Melody Effect duration and increases the chance of larger heals from healing melodies.
Greatly increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies.

Charge Up.description: Increases your power to induce stun when you hit a monster with a hammer's charged attack.

Airborne.description: Increases the damage caused by jumping attacks.

Poison Duration Up.description: Extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters.
levels: Extends the duration of your poison's effect by 20%.

Guard.description: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.
levels: Slightly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
Decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

Guard Up.description: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

Load Shells.description: Improves reloading, and increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.
levels: Increases shell and phial reloading speed.
Increases shell/phial reloading speed. Gunlance loading capacity +1. Charge blade charges 5 phials on yellow gauge.

Speed Sharpening.description: Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.
levels: Removes one cycle from the sharpening process.
Removes two cycles from the sharpening process.

Slicked Blade.description: Temporarily increases affinity when wet or when inflicted with bubbleblight. (Wet and bubbleblight effects stack.)
levels: Affinity +3% when wet, and +7% while afflicted with bubbleblight.
Affinity +6% when wet, and +14% while afflicted with bubbleblight.
Affinity +9% when wet, and +21% while afflicted with bubbleblight.

Whiteflame Torrent.description: Chance to deal additional damage after landing an attack.
levels: Activates skill effect. (When used with Scorcher, does not stack but adds extra fire damage.)

Convert Thunder Resistance.description: Increase to your weapon's elemental attack proportional to your thunder resistance.

Bladescale Honing.description: Narrowly evading a monster's attack while your weapon is drawn grants special sharpness.

Bladescale Loading.description: Narrowly evading a monster's attack while your weapon is drawn grants special loaded ammo or applied coatings.

Power Stone.description: Temporarily increases attack upon mining materials.
levels: Mining particularly rare materials greatly increases attack. (Attack increase has a maximum limit.)

Crackling Cornpopper.description: Increases shelling power and fire attack while overheated.

Evading Reload.description: Evading loads the currently selected ammo automatically.

Resentment.description: Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your Health Gauge).

Adrenaline Rush.description: Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed evade just as a monster attacks.

Peak Performance.description: Increases attack when your health is full.

Counterstrike.description: Temporarily increases attack power after being knocked back.
levels: Attack +15 while active. Moderately extends effect time.
Attack +25 while active. Extends effect time.

Weakness Exploit.description: Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster's weak points and wounds.
levels: Attacks that hit weak points gain affinity +5%, with an extra 3% on wounds.
Attacks that hit weak points gain affinity +10%, with an extra 5% on wounds.
Attacks that hit weak points gain affinity +15%, with an extra 10% on wounds.
Attacks that hit weak points gain affinity +20%, with an extra 15% on wounds.
Attacks that hit weak points gain affinity +30%, with an extra 20% on wounds.

Maximum Might.description: Increases affinity if stamina is kept full for a period of time.

Convert Element.description: After taking elemental damage, temporarily grants you dragon element effects. (Cooldown after effect ends.)
levels: While active, deals extra dragon damage after dealing enough elemental damage. Slightly increases dragon attack.
Increases additional dragon damage and increases dragon attack.
Further increases additional dragon damage and greatly increases dragon attack.

Defense Boost.description: Increases defense. Also improves resistances at higher levels.

Divine Blessing.description: Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.
levels: While active, reduces damage taken by 15%.
While active, reduces damage taken by 30%.
While active, reduces damage taken by 50%.

Fire Resistance.description: Increases fire resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

Water Resistance.description: Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

Thunder Resistance.description: Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

Ice Resistance.description: Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

Dragon Resistance.description: Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

levels: Reduces the number of times you take poison damage.
Greatly reduces the number of times you take poison damage.
Reduces the duration of paralysis by 30%.
Reduces the duration of paralysis by 60%.
Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%.
Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%.
Reduces the duration of defense down by 50%.
Reduces the duration of defense down by 75%.

Blight Resistance.description: Grants protection against all elemental blights.
levels: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 50%.
Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 75%
Reduces the duration of stun by 30%.
Reduces the duration of stun by 60%.

Bind Resistance.description: Grants protection against webbed status and frostblight.
levels: Allows you to quickly recover from webbed status or frostblight.
Allows you to very quickly recover from webbed status or frostblight.
Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage.
Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage.

Adaptability.description: Grants protection against environmental damage, such as from heat or cold.
levels: Negates the effects of heat and cold.

Recovery Up.description: Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.

Recovery Speed.description: Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the Health Gauge).
levels: Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Quadruples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

Survival Expert.description: Extra health is recovered from environmental interactables.

Constitution.description: Reduces stamina depletion when evading, blocking, or doing certain other actions.

Marathon Runner.description: Slows down stamina depletion for actions that continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).

Hunger Resistance.description: Reduces maximum stamina depetion over time.
levels: Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 50%.
Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 100%.
Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing.

Agitator.description: Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.

Latent Power.description: Increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion after about 2 minutes of combat or after taking around 130 damage.  The effect lasts about 2 minutes.
levels: While active, affinity +10% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
While active, affinity +20% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
While active, affinity +30% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
While active, affinity +30% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.
While active, affinity +50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

Heroics.description: Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.
levels: Attack +30% and defense-increasing effects are negated while active.

Burst.description: Continuously landing hits gradually increases attack and elemental attack. (Amount increased depends on weapon.  Lasts 4 seconds.)
levels: On first hit, gain a small temporary attack and element boost, replaced by a larger boost after the fifth hit.
Hit 5 successive times for a moderate stat boost.
Hit 5 successive times for a bigger stat boost.
Hit 5 successive times for an even bigger stat boost.
Hit 5 successive times for a huge stat boost.

Foray.description: Increases attack power and affinity against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.
levels: Attack +6 against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.
Attack +8 and affinity +5% against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.
Attack +10 and affinity +10% against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.
Attack +12 and affinity +15% against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.
Attack +15 and affinity +20% against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.

Flayer.description: Makes it easier to inflict wounds. Upon inflicting enough damage, also deals additional non-elemental damage,
levels: Makes it ever so slightly easier to inflict wounds. Also deals additional non-elemental damage.
Makes it moderately easier to inflict wounds. Also deals slightly more additional non-elemental damage.
Makes it easier to inflict wounds. Also deals moderately more additional non-elemental damage.
Makes it much easier to inflict wounds. Also deals more additional non-elemental damage.
Makes it significantly easier to inflict wounds. Also deals much more additional non-elemental damage.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 5%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 10%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 15%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 20%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 25%.

Partbreaker.description: Makes it easier to break large monster parts, and increases damage dealt when destroying a wound with a Focus Strike.
levels: Increases part damage and damage dealt when conditions are met by 10%.
Increases part damage and damage dealt when conditions are met by 20%.
Increases part damage and damage dealt when conditions are met by 30%.

Coalescence.description: Temporarily increases elemental attack power and status effects after recovering from blights or abnormal status.
levels: When active, grants a slight increase to elemental damage and status buildup.
When active, grants an increase to elemental damage and status buildup.
When active, grants a large increase to elemental damage and status buildup.

Ambush.description: Temporarily increases the damage to large monsters with a successful Sneak Attack.

Antivirus.description: Once infected, makes it easier to overcome the Frenzy and increases affinity if cured (overcoming Frenzy without any levels of Antivirus, already gives +15% affinity).
levels: Slightly increases recovery rate after contracting the Frenzy. Affinity +3% if cured.
Increases recovery rate after contracting the Frenzy. Affinity +6% if cured.
Greatly increases recovery rate after contracting the Frenzy. Affinity +10% if cured.

Elemental Absorption.description: After taking elemental damage, temporarily grants you element effects. (Cooldown after effect ends)
levels: While active, slightly increases elemental attack, and resistance to element taken at activation by 4.
While active, moderately increases elemental attack, and resistance to element taken at activation by 6.
While active, increases elemental attack, and resistance to element taken at activation by 8.

Self-Improvement.description: Attack and defense increase as time passes while on a quest. (The maximum is reached after 30 minutes.)

Evade Window.description: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.

Earplugs.description: Grants protection from large monsters' roars.
levels: Reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
Nullifies weak monster roars and reduces the effects of strong monster roars.
Nullifies weak and strong monster roars.
Negates minor wind pressure and halves the effect of major wind pressure.
Negates minor wind pressure and halves the effect of dragon wind pressure.
Negates all kinds of wind pressure.
Nullifies very minor ground tremors and halves effects of minor ground tremors.
Nullifies up to minor ground tremors and greatly reduces the effects of major grounded tremors.

Flinch Free.description: Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.
levels: Prevents knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback instead.

Intimidator.description: Reduces the chance small monsters will attack after spotting you. (Has no effect on certain monsters.)
levels: Discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
Highly discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
Prevents monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.

Aquatic/Oilsilt Mobility.description: Grants resistance against impairments to mobility while in water, oilsilt, or streams.
levels: Negates the effects of muddy streams, and prevents you from being slowed down in water or oilsilt.
Also negates the effects of waves.

Shock Absorber.description: Disables damage reactions when you hit a friend or when a friend hits you.

Leap of Faith.description: Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters and extends the dive-evade distance.

Jump Master.description: Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.

Cliffhanger.description: Decrease stamina depletion when climbing on vines.
levels: Reduces stamina depletion while climbing by 50%.

Wide-Range.description: Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.
levels: Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with full efficacy.

Tool Specialist.description: Reduces the recharge time for specialized tools.

Bombardier.description: Increases the damage of explosive items.

Mushroomancer.description: Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.
levels: Lets you digets blue mushrooms (potion effect) and toadstools (immunizer effect).
Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms (demon drug effect) and parashrooms (armor skin effect).
Additionally lets you digest mandragoras (max potion effect), devil's blight (dash juice effect), and exciteshrooms (random mushroom effect).

Item Prolonger.description: Extends the duration of some item effects.

Free Meal.description: Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.

Blindsider.description: Improves the effectiveness of flash attacks and items.
levels: Improves the effectiveness of flash attacks and items.

Botanist.description: Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather
levels: One extra consumbale herb item per gather.
Additionally adds one extra consumable fruit, nut, or seed item per gather.
Additionally adds one extra consumable insect item per gather.
Additionally adds one extra consumable mushroom item per gather.

Geologist.description: Increases the number of times you gain at gathering points.
levels: One extra item when gathering from bonepiles.
Additionally adds one extra item when gathering special items.
Additionally adds one extra item when gathering from mining outcrops.

Entomologist.description: The bodies of small insect monsters won't be destroyed, allowing them to be carved.

Outdoorsman.description: Improves fishing, grilling, and transporting abilities.
levels: Improves fishing, grilling, and transporting abilities.

Rice Ball.description: Increases the attack power of Akuma actions and stun damage.
